body.name: ComfortSpa Reading Pillow for Bed Adult Size, Back Rest Pillow with Arms, Pockets and Washable Cover; Use as a Back Pillow for Sitting in Bed for Bedrest or Relief from GERD Heartburn (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 25 mins
features: DELUXE READING PILLOW – ComfortSpa reading pillows are made of shredded foam that conform perfectly to all body types for optimum alignment while relaxing upright. Featuring BONUS storage located in the arms side pockets for your phone, glasses, book, tablet, or remote.

BED WEDGE – The ComfortSpa backrest is shipped compressed. Just remove the wrapping; loosen the shredded foam by shaking vigorously for 5 minutes, or by placing it in the dryer (NO heat) with two clean tennis balls for 5 minutes. Allow 24-48 hours for pillow to fully expand; pillow measures 18 inches high by 15 inches wide, providing firm ample back support. Each arm extends out 11 inches to support your shoulders and neck, reducing stress on joints and muscles for optimum healthy comfort.

VERSATILE COMFORT – The ComfortSpa lounge cushion provides comfortable back support for sitting up in bed while reading a good book, watching TV, or surfing the internet. Features medical grade material for those on bedrest , suffering from GERD or heartburn. Use as a wedge to elevate your upper body to help you stay more comfortable while at rest or sleep .

EASY CARE STAIN RESISTANT – ComfortSpa pillows feature a warm grey breathable velour cover that can easily be spot cleaned with a damp cloth. Featuring anti-clump shredded foam padding for a lifetime of soft comfort-ability. The attached fabric handle makes it easy to carry your pillow with you from room to room.

GUARANTEE – We want you to completely satisfied with your ComfortSpa reading pillow. We have a no hassle 100% guarantee refund policy. If you use your ComfortSpa Reading Pillow and do not love it, simply return for a full refund, even used. Add one to your cart today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST bed pillow for comfort and reading EVER
reviews.reviewText: There was absolutely nothing to dislike about this. I have used others in the past, but they bulged in the wrong spot while never enabling you to set up comfortably as well as have side support.The only way I can describe it is it feels the way you do then you have someone sitting close behind you with their arms cuddled next to your side allowing you to comfortably rest on them or if you are into stuffed animals like I am, it’s like being swaddled by a giant teddy bear. LolI ordered an extra one to give as a gift who is bedridden. I know she’s gonna love it especially because it’s like Goldilocks it’s not too firm and it’s not too soft. It’s just right.Wedges are horrible since they are inflexible and make you sweat. There are some that remind me of a back of a beach chair, which is not conducive to actually comfortably sitting in bed.What is so funny is I can fall asleep sitting against this and not wake up achy which happens when I tried to bunch pillows together and fell asleep. I have a hard time sleeping anyway, but the craziest thing is as soon as I get in bed and use this I fall asleep within 25 minutes. So this not only is a great item to use for sitting in bed reading or using your laptop, but it also is fantastic if you fall asleep as well as help when you go to sleep, believe it or not.Kudos to the husband and wife who came up with this idea. Thank you thank you thank you. Also the material is just right.I will probably buy two more and put them in my bedroom closet for future use. I did forget to say this is perfect because I have a headboard that has a book shelf area across the entire bed where I place the books I am reading or will be reading, but it, makes sitting up in the bed uncomfortable.Buy it and you’ll be happy that you did plus like I said it makes a fantastic gift for someone who is bedridden or recovering from surgery or an injury, requiring them to stay in bed. They will love you for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Designed and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciate the design allowing me to adjust the amount of padding inside in addition to being able to remove and wash the outer sleeve. The pockets are also a nice addition, although they are not very big; it can fit a phone pretty comfortably.I saw a complaint about it seeming overstuffed, but you could just remove some stuffing to your liking. I also saw some complain about inconsistency in stuffing amount when purchasing multiple. I can only speak for myself in that the stuffing is a perfect amount; so while I didn’t need to try, there’s an included paper noting that you can contact the manufacturer to request more stuffing if there isn’t enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s sturdy and comfortable. I enjoy using it when in bed, good support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: LOVE my pillow! It’s pretty firm so I can sit up in bed and read without getting a neck ache from hunching over. Bought another for my adult son who has scoliosis and now my husband wants one. It is a little lumpy from the filling so isn’t perfectly smooth but that might settle with time. I had one years ago but this is an excellent design for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My back would thank me if it could.
reviews.reviewText: I had been thinking about getting me a sturdier back rest for some time. I love to read but would find myself slipping further and further down whether on my lounger or the bed. This support system works perfectly. I love the blue and it is so soft. I also like the fact that I was helping a small business located in Virginia since that is where I live. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I mean...it does its job..I guess I'm just picky?
reviews.reviewText: I use this product for support like most people do. For me I thought it was added comfort for when sitting up in a bed or even a couch or a type of chair for reading or watching tv. Those couches, beds or some chairs that supports your sitting position but they do not necessarily have a lot of support in the right places for lumbar support (the lower back). It works though.The one I ordered came with a slight faint mildew like smell but its only on one arm of the pillow. I call it a mildew like smell because there is no sign or stain indicating that its mildew. I read that things like this and memory foam mattresses do this thing called off gassing where when used or just at random (probably due to temperatures and other environmental factors) a chemical smell will be released from within the foam inside the product. I don't think mine is off-gassing. Hopefully mine is the only one with this issue. with off gassing the smell usually dissipates. Mine just hasn't yet that's why I think its something else but there hasn't been any spills or any reason to cause the smell.The other thing I like but don't like if that makes sense is that the product guide that came with it ( a small paper pamphlet thingy) says that in time this product will get more comfortable (I remember reading the word softer). Mine has not. maybe I don't used it enough but it has kept its shape and it doesn't necessarily hinder my comfort when in use but it seems it still hasn't softened yet and all I need is for it to soften just a teensy weensy bit and it would be perfect for me. I think that maybe when it was made it was filled a little more than usual so its still on the firmer side which could be excellent for someone else.Some fun points (In my opinion or imo as the younger generations say/ text ): it came in a huge box... a product box not just the amazon box. its vacuum sealed. when you open it you have to shake it for 5 minutes as per the instructions in the product user pamphlet and it has pockets on both arms to store things like your phone, your remote, plug in headphones, a post it note pad will definitely fit inside. I use the pockets for headphones, hair ties and so I wont lose my earrings if I happen to not want to get up and put them away right when I take them off. So if you've read this far, don't take my review as a negative one.. this product has its good points, I think I could be just too picky at times. The fabric seems to be a stretch material and is soft to the touch. Just know it has worked for me as in served its purpose so far and there isn't any tears, or rips and my youngest has borrowed mine while virtual learning and asked for one of her own so that is a plus I guess. Other products I have seen in stores do not hold their shape are too soft so I wont serve well as for support on its own but this one so far is good. Now if only the makers could provide other colors or fabric choices or maybe covers to be more decorative that would be a huge plus too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT!! Supportive, great fabric, and terrific features
reviews.reviewText: Precisely what I was looking for in a reading pillow. Arrived in a vacuum sealed bag, but easy to follow opening instructions meant I had the cushiest hug of a reading pillow the next day. It’s easy to move from couch to bed and back with the handle, and I love the side pockets to stash my Kindle. I appreciate that I can zip off the cover to wash it. Highly recommended!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am happy about it
reviews.reviewText: These fluffed right on up!! They are firm and comfortable. I am a plus sized cutie and I love the back support. I feel fully supported . I am pleased with the purchase.

When the pillow first arrived in this very small box, I thought for sure Amazon had sent the wrong order. The directions said it would obtain full size within a few days. I thought there is no way this is going to happen, but surprisingly it sure did and I use it daily. Very good quality and comfortable back support!

Muy cómodo y perfecto para acomodarte en cama. Lo compré para mi mamá ya que por salud debía estar acostada o sentada y le gusto muchísimo.Viene al vacío, debes sacarlo y amoldarlo para que agarre forma y en unos minutos queda perfecto. También trae más relleno por si gustas, para mi como viene esta perfecto.El tamaño, la textura y la tela muy agradables y cuenta con bolsas a los lados y por la parte de atrás.Sin duda volvería a comprarlo!
